Perceptor:

Perceptor nodded with Hydras' command and ran towards the battle 
field. Then he arrived where Sharpclaws were "It will be fun" said 
devilish the male while he took his Gun


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus drives over a drop in the ground. Do to his speed he went 
airborne. When in the air, Rodimus ran right through the wall of 
fire, hitting the ground again. He barely slowed down, staying on 
course. The Predacon reinforcements meant nothing to him.
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw heard Carnation and left the Predacon base, in jaguar 
mode.
> He soon was with Carnation at Flicker's location.
> SharpClaw: SharpClaw, TERRORIZE!
> He transformes to bot mode, drawing his plasma rifle.
> SharpClaw: Come on Maximals!
>  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:Carnatron turned into Hydras and shot out 
a fire ball igniting the ground on 
> fire creating a fire wall between the maximal troops and flicker. 
He then 
> transformed into Prime's robot mode and fired the big gun at any 
maximal that 
> moved. Carnatron sent a telepathic message to Hydras, "Sir you 
might want to 
> get here...only you are a match for Rodimus." Hydras growled. "The 
rest of you 
> stay here Sharpclaw come with me." He turned into the dragon and 
flew towards 
> flicker.
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus heard Condor over the comm, but didn't have time to 
reply. He knew that 
> > the CR failed. Condor was gone. Rodimus let out an angered growl 
as he, somehow, 
> > picks up even more speed.
> > Eventually Rodimus had caught up with the rest of the Maximal 
force. They were 
> > good troops.
> > Rodimus starts to overtake them. He sees Flicker, but was still 
trailing.
> > Rodimus yells out with so much anger that you would think he had 
gone mad. Maybe 
> > he had.
> > Rodimus Prime: FLICKER!!!!!!!!!! WITH PRIMUS HIMSELF AS MY 
WITNESS, I'M GOING TO 
> > KILL YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
> >  cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...> wrote:Flicker::
> > 
> > "Pretty dense, aren't you?" Flicker growls, taking aim 
again.  "An 
> > expendable bot is useless as a hostage."  He fires, nearly point-
> > blank.
> > 
> > Rolling away, he opens a channel to the Predacon base.  "Flicker 
to 
> > Hydras!  My cover's been blown and I've got half the Maximal 
force on 
> > my tail.  Request backup immediately!"  He relays the 
coordinates.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > > ::Aerotaur::
> > >        He barrel rolls to the side to avoid the oncoming fire 
and 
> > uses the 
> > > momentary distraction to recover ground on Flicker.  He 
manages to 
> > lower his 
> > > voice this time.  "Look Flicker, I'm only going to say this 
once.  
> > She has a 
> > > baby.  If you want a hostage, take me.  She has someone who 
needs 
> > her.  I 
> > > don't.  I'm expendable."
> >
